chatDetail.interestedCleaning: Hi! I'm interested in your cleaning services. Are you available this weekend?
chatDetail.availableWeekend: Hello! Yes, I'm available this weekend. What type of cleaning do you need?
chatDetail.needDeepClean: I need a deep clean for my 2-bedroom apartment. Kitchen and bathrooms especially.
chatDetail.perfectRate: Perfect! I can do that for you. For a 2-bedroom deep clean, my rate is $120. Would Saturday at 2 PM work?
chatDetail.soundsGreat: That sounds great! Saturday at 2 PM works perfectly. Should I prepare anything beforehand?
chatDetail.makeAccess: Just make sure I have access to all rooms and clear any personal items you don't want moved. I'll bring all cleaning supplies!

help.title: Help & Support
help.sendMessage: Send us a message and we'll get back to you
help.name: Name
help.paymentAnswer: Payments are processed within 1-2 business days after job completion. You can request payouts from your earnings page.
help.howContactClient: How do I contact a client?
help.contactAnswer: Once you apply for a job, you can message the client directly through our chat system.
help.cancelJob: What if I need to cancel a job?
help.cancelAnswer: You can cancel up to 24 hours before the scheduled time. Please contact the client as soon as possible.
